Rafael Pina - Bio

Hi! I am Rafael and I am a PhD student at Loughborough University London. I have started my journey at the University of Coimbra, in Portugal, where I got my BSc in Informatics Engineering. After that, I got myself into a plane London to pursue a MSc degree at Loughborough University London. During the time of my masters, I did works as a Research Assistant, which gave me a small taste of the world of research. After completing my masters degree I started my PhD at Loughborough University London. Since then, while carrying out my research, I have also been assisting in teaching.

Education

2020 - Present
PhD in Machine Intelligence @ Loughborough University London (UK)

2019 - 2020
MSc Cyber Security and Big Data @ Loughborough University London (UK)

2016 - 2019
BSc Informatics Engineering @ University of Coimbra (PT)

Interests

  • Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (main research focus)
  • Multi-Agent Systems
  • Reinforcement Learning
  • Data Science
  • Computer Security
  • Maths
  • Music, cinema, and books :)
